landing.title: How to use our help responsibly?
landing.step1: Complete the questionnaire. You'll immediately receive a personal report with your test results.
landing.step2: Our GP or POH‑GGZ screens your answers. You'll quickly hear whether, and how, you qualify for a care pathway.
landing.paragraph: Are you looking for more specialized psychological care or are you already in treatment? Then contact a psychology practice directly. Also consider whether online psychological support suits you; it's often as effective as face-to-face contact.

tests.title: Questionnaire: The Spiderweb (Optional)
tests.subtitle: Fill in the questionnaire or proceed to finish.

card.title: Spiderweb (Positive Health)
card.subtitle: Self-scan across 6 life domains
card.bullet2: Helps with insight and conversation about what matters to you

quiz.generalSubtitle: Answer the general questions first. Afterwards you can optionally complete the Spiderweb.
quiz.errorsHeading: Please fill in the missing fields:

errors.preferences: Select at least one preferred treatment

quiz.q1Label: 1. Estimate how many appointments you think you'll need?

preferences.poh_ggz: Face to face with POH GGZ

summary.title: Summary
summary.disclaimer: Note: interpretations are indicative and do not replace a diagnosis.

errors.emailListInvalid: Email address is invalid or missing
errors.sendFailed: An error occurred while sending. Please try again later.

advice.noteHelpText: Enter your name, date of birth and email so we can link your request correctly.

modal.sentText: We'll contact you by email soon.
modal.successMessage: We have received your request and will review it as soon as possible.

spinnenweb.title: Spiderweb (Positive Health)
spinnenweb.intro: Answer the questions for each domain (0–10). We’ll then show your spiderweb.
spinnenweb.scaleLegend: Scale: 0 = not at all, 10 = very much
spinnenweb.averages: Average scores (0–10) per domain, based on your answers.
spinnenweb.answerToSee: Answer the questions first to see your results.
spinnenweb.allBalanced: All domains are currently in balance.
spinnenweb.explainer: This spiderweb shows your average score (0–10) per domain. It is intended as a reflection aid and not a diagnosis. Discuss your profile with a professional for context and next steps.
spinnenweb.congratsText: All questions are answered and your personal spiderweb is ready.

questions.lich-2: I sleep enough and recover well.
questions.lich-3: I have enough energy for daily activities.
questions.ment-1: I can cope well with stress.
questions.zing-1: I have a clear sense of direction.
questions.zing-3: I live according to my values.
questions.kvl-1: I am satisfied with my life.
questions.mdn-1: I have support from my social environment.
questions.mdn-2: I feel part of a community.
questions.mdn-3: I can take part in activities that matter to me.
questions.dfn-1: I can carry out daily tasks as I want.
questions.dfn-3: I can organize my time effectively.
